actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-1109.

official_title: Resolution waiving points of order against certain provisions contained in H.R. 15404.  A bill making appropriations for the Departments of State, Justice, and Commerce, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.

summary.text: Waives points of order against certain provisions contained in the bill H.R. 15404 making appropriations for the Departments of State, Justice, and Commerce, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution waiving points of order against certain provisions contained in H.R. 15404.  A bill making appropriations for the Departments of State, Justice, and Commerce, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
